problem: The app is running very slow.
solution: Close background apps, check your internet, and update GROW to the latest version.

problem: I forgot my password, how can I reset it?
solution: Tap 'Forgot Password' on the login screen and follow the instructions.

problem: How do I cancel my subscription?
solution: Go to Account Settings > Subscription and select 'Cancel Subscription.' Follow the prompts.

problem: Can I export my data from the app?
solution: Go to Account Settings > Data Management and select 'Export Data.'

problem: My profile picture won't upload.
solution: Ensure the image meets size/format requirements and check your internet connection.

problem: My data is not syncing across devices.
solution: Log into the same account on all devices and check your internet connection.

problem: App is not updating automatically.
solution: Check your device's auto-update settings and ensure enough storage space.

problem: How do I cancel my subscription?
solution: Go to Account Settings > Subscription and select 'Cancel Subscription.' Follow the prompts.

problem: My profile picture won't upload.
solution: Ensure the image meets size/format requirements and check your internet connection.

problem: Is my personal data safe on GROW?
solution: GROW uses industry-standard encryption and security practices. See our Privacy Policy for details.

problem: I can't log in to my account.
solution: Please check your email and password. If you forgot your password, use 'Forgot Password' to reset it.

problem: How do I contact customer support?
solution: Go to Help & Support in the app and choose 'Contact Us.'

problem: I forgot my password, how can I reset it?
solution: Tap 'Forgot Password' on the login screen and follow the instructions.

problem: Can't access premium features.
solution: Ensure your subscription is active. If not, renew or contact support.

problem: The app freezes on the home screen.
solution: Restart your device, update the app, or clear the app cache.

problem: How do I change my email address?
solution: Go to Account Settings > Personal Info and update your email. Confirm via the verification link.

problem: Why am I getting duplicate notifications?
solution: Log out and back in, or reinstall the app. Check for multiple accounts on your device.

solution: Restart your device and update the app. If it continues, reinstall or contact support.
